QuestData.Title: Fiery Wings
QuestData.Description: I think that old paper said something about "fiery wings." Those little dragons around here have wings. They're kind of fiery, in a way.$b$bYou're quicker than me. Try catching some of those dragons... or at least slapping the powder off of them.$b$bNo point in killing a harmless little dragon, if all you want is the sparkle from their wings.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slap Rikkilea Flitterlings, then catch 88 flecks of Flitterling Dust.
QuestData.CompletionText: I haven't been able to catch any of those things!
QuestData.RewardText: YEAH!!! FLITTERLING DUST!!!$b$b<Olon throws the powder into the pot.>$b$bThis brew is turning out... strange, and pretty smelly. I'm starting to think maybe Lya was right.
